body.name: Pen Holder for Desk, Pencil Holder,5 Slots 360° Degree Rotating Desk Organizers and Accessories, Cute Pen Cup Pot for Office, School, Home, Art Supply (white)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 42 mins
features: This pen holder organizer can be rotated 360 degrees from side to side. You can rotate it at any Angle to easily store or remove what you want, keeping your stationery supplies organized and easy to find.

5 Compartments designed to be perfect for storing desktop stationery such as pens, pencils, markers, highlighters, rulers, staplers, flash drives, erasers, paper clips, scissors, letter openers and many other desktops.
Fixed desk storage size: 5.9 "x4.7" x5.9 "/15x12x15cm. This stationery storage device takes up very little space on your desk, but provides maximum storage capacity.

This pen holder organizer is made of environmentally friendly, non-toxic ABS material and will not cause any harm. It is strong and durable enough to be used for a long time. Extremely smooth surfaces and rounded edges do not harm your things or yourself.
It is suitable for offices, families, schools, classrooms, living rooms, bedrooms, dressers, dressers, and any place you need; It helps to keep your desk clean and tidy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and Functional Desk Organization
reviews.reviewText: The WNING Pen Holder for Desk has become an essential addition to my workspace, adding a delightful touch of organization and style. This rotating desk organizer not only keeps my writing essentials in order but also adds a touch of charm to my office setup.Pros:Innovative Design: The 360° degree rotating design of this pen holder is a game-changer. It allows easy access to all five slots, making it simple to grab the pen or pencil I need without any fuss. The spinning feature also adds a touch of fun to my desk.Ample Storage: With five slots, this pen holder provides ample storage for all my writing tools, from pens and pencils to markers and scissors. It helps me keep my workspace tidy and clutter-free.Sturdy Construction: The pen holder is well-built and stable, ensuring that it won't tip over easily, even when I spin it. The quality materials and craftsmanship give it a durable feel that should last for a long time.Cute and Stylish: The design is not only functional but also cute and stylish. It adds a pop of personality to my desk and brightens up the workspace. It's perfect for adding a touch of creativity to my home office or any setting.Multi-Purpose: While designed primarily as a pen holder, it's versatile enough to store various items, such as art supplies, makeup brushes, or even utensils in the kitchen. Its versatility makes it a valuable organizational tool in multiple areas of my life.Easy Assembly: Setting up the pen holder was straightforward, with clear instructions provided. I had it ready to use in a matter of minutes.Cons:Size Consideration: If you have an extensive collection of writing tools or larger items to store, you might find the storage capacity limited. However, it's perfect for the essentials and encourages a clutter-free workspace.In summary, the WNING Pen Holder for Desk is a fun and functional desk organizer that brings both practicality and style to my workspace. Its innovative rotating design, ample storage, and cute appearance make it a valuable addition to any office, school, or home setting. It has helped me keep my writing tools organized and easily accessible, which boosts my productivity and adds a touch of personality to my desk. If you're looking for an efficient yet charming way to organize your desk, this pen holder is an excellent choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute & stylish pen/pencil holder
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two (one blue & one orange). They are much sturdier than I expected based on the low price point and they are also very stylish. They hold a lot of items for your desk. For anyone who teaches or works with elementary and younger children, these would be great for crayons, markers, colored pencils, etc. I would buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great addition to my craft area!
reviews.reviewText: I have a small craft area. This was so perfect cause I can just put it on the window ledge away from the kids. And since it rotates, I don’t have a hard time getting to what I need.It holds all my cricut pens, plus more! I have about 20 infusible ink pens/markers and the ultimate fine point ink set. The middle part is a little higher, so I put my scissors and cutting knife there. After all that, I still have an extra compartment to spare.
